model

Class Snake

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Snake

  • public class Snake
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton-class representing the snake (part of the model in the MVC design pattern)

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Snake THE_SNAKE
      the snake-singleton
